content: look out winter hat roberta rich 2020 from kids on the playground to adults who wear hardhats - everyone can have a clear view and warm ears how great is that this winter hat will let you see where you are going while keeping your ears protected from the wind and cold no more hat in your eyes when tugged down over your ears magically these earflaps fit snug without ties the pattern is designed for all knitters novice or experienced working on two needles or in the round the instructions will make a basic hat but it begs for creative knitters to add some pizazz i m guessing that after finishing one hat you will want to make another and another the knitting is easy fast and the end product is curiously satisfying i would be greatly pleased if you knit a few for donation to your local elementary school extra hats on hand will help every child enjoy recess yarn cascade 220 superwash merino worsted any worsted weight yarn 100-150 yds needles size 7 dp s if working in the round gauge 4 = 21 stitches 29 row stitch markers abbreviations and techniques k = knit p = purl repeat = repeat ssk = slip slip knit decrease kfb = knit front and back increase bind off = knit one *knit one pass first stitch on right needle over the second repeat from * twins landon and liam 4 years old wearing size s sizes xs s m l xs baby toddler s preschool - lower elementary m upper elementary adult l adult l and xl when choosing hat size keep in mind that this hat is very stretchy while still maintaining its shape you might size up or down depending on your preference for yarn weight needle size or gauge finished hat height is approximately 7 8 9 10 inches bottom band the bottom band is knit sideways in garter stitch there are four simple row i m certain you will have them memorized after knitting them just once rsr right side row = k all stitches incr increase row = k 3 kfb knit to end of row decr decrease row = k 3 ssk k to end of row note all wrong side row are worked exactly the same wsr wrong side row = slip 1 stitch as if to purl bring yarn to the back of your work and knit until the last 3 stitches bring your yarn to the front of your work and slip the last 3 stitches as if to purl stitch count total garter ridges back use long tail to cast on 10 12 14 16 sts leave a 12 tail 10 12 14 16 rsr wsr repeat 3 3 4 4 times 3 3 4 4 this means knit a right side row and then a wrong side row repeated for a total of 3 3 4 4 times for a total of 6 6 8 8 row helper
